de.nec.nle.siafu.output

Class CSVPrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.nec.nle.siafu.output.CSVPrinter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimulatorOutputPrinter

    public class CSVPrinter
extends Object
implements SimulatorOutputPrinter
    This implementation of SimulatorOutputPrinter prints all the information of an agent, plus the value of the overlays (that is, the whole context set) for each of the users, in a Comma Separated Value file format.

    Each time the interval given in the config file has passed, a printout is generated. If the history option is set to true, the printout will accumulate the data for all the iterations. Otherwise only the latest iteration will be kept.

    Note that all the fields in the CSV are common to all the entities, and derived from the agent returned by World.getPeople().iterator().next(). Therefore, you need to make sure this particular user has all the entries in his data fields.

    Author:
    Miquel Martin

      • CSVPrinter

        public CSVPrinter(World world,
          org.apache.commons.configuration.Configuration config)
        Builds a CVSPrinter object. If history is to be kept, this already initializes the output file.
        Parameters:
        world - the world to print about
        config - the simulation configuration file

    • Method Detail

      • notifyIterationConcluded

        public void notifyIterationConcluded()
        Prints the information of all the agents into the output file if interval time has passed since the last printout. This will wipe out the old information in the file, unless the keepHistory option has been enabled in the config file.
        Specified by:
        notifyIterationConcluded in interface SimulatorOutputPrinter

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup()
        Flushes the remaining data, and closes the output files.
        Specified by:
